structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.history: Repealed 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 8, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4329.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Employment and compensation of county road employes.
